app.title: Haolei QR Code Taona
app.subtitle: Internet Leipa • Pazi Leipa • API Leipa • 100% local
preview.title: Live Preview
preview.subtitle: Nawh a hna hrawh tawh
preview.placeholder: Nang QR a he a awm
cookies.title: Cookies & Preferences
cookies.body: Preferences leh consent hna cangpiak a, cookies kan hman. Generator hman thei a, accept a ngai.
privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.overview.title: Overview
privacy.overview.body: Haolei QR Code Generator hi offline-first tool a ni. QR hna hi browser ah a hman. Data hna server ah kan hman lo.
privacy.data.title: Data kan hman
privacy.data.item1: Input content: Nang text ema URL hluh hi local ah QR a siam.
privacy.data.item2: Preferences: We store your size, color, format, and theme preferences in cookies on your device.
privacy.cookies.title: Cookies
privacy.cookies.body: Preferences leh consent a hrua nak a, cookies kan hman. Tracking hna kan hman lo.
privacy.third.title: Third‑Party Libraries
privacy.third.body: Site hi QRCode.js leh jsPDF a hman; CDN chungah a hman.
privacy.choice.title: Nang choice
privacy.choice.body: Browser settings ah cookies delete thei. Preferences leh consent reset a ni.
privacy.contact.title: Contact
about.title: Haolei QR Code Generator About
about.subtitle: Offline-first QR generation leh modern UX.
about.what.title: A hna
about.what.body: Browser ah chak tawh QR siam. Internet a awm loh hna chungah pawh a hman thei.
about.offline.title: Offline ah Hman Thei — Service Worker Cache ih
about.offline.intro: Haolei QR Code Generator hi Progressive Web App (PWA) a ni tawh offline ah hman thei. A hmasa bik ah site ka tlawh loh chuan, file pawimawh hna hi device ah automatically cache a ni.
about.offline.how.title: A hna dan
about.offline.how.body: App ka load hmasa bik ah, Service Worker hi background ah install a ni tawh HTML pages, stylesheets, scripts, translation files, leh logo hna cache a ni. Tlawh khat hnuah, app pumpi hi browser cache ah a awm tawh — internet connection a ngai lo.
about.offline.what.title: Cache a ni hna
about.offline.item1: Pages hna: Generator, About, leh Privacy
about.offline.strategy.title: Cache strategy
about.offline.strategy.body: App hi page hna ah network-first leh assets hna ah cache-first strategy a hman. Online ah a thar bik ka hmuh, offline ah pawh a hman thei. Version thar deploy a nih chuan cache pawh a update.
about.offline.benefit.title: A pawimawh nah
about.offline.benefit.body: Vanleng chungah, signal awm loh hmun ah, ema network ngah loh duh ah pawh, Haolei QR Code Generator hi hman thei. Install a ngai lo — tlawh khat mai.
about.why.title: A pawimawh
about.why.body: Data hi device chungah a awm; tracking lo.
about.open.title: Open source
about.open.body: MIT license a ni; custom thei.
about.contact.title: Contact
language.label: Language
